# Hot Lava Agency
> Full-service advertising agency delivering non-toxic creative solutions.

Hot Lava Agency is a full-service advertising agency focused on creative strategy, digital marketing, and brand development.

The website is primarily a single page with anchored sections (About, Work, Shop, Contact). Core content is server-rendered HTML; animations and video interactions are enhanced with JavaScript.

## Key pages & sections
- [Homepage](https://www.hotlavaagency.com/) — Main site (all sections).
- [About (team)](https://www.hotlavaagency.com/#about-us) — Who we are + bios.
- [Work](https://www.hotlavaagency.com/#work) — Selected work (video links).
- [Shop](https://www.hotlavaagency.com/#shop) — Product grid linking to the store.
- [Contact](https://www.hotlavaagency.com/#contact) — Email + social profiles.
